record.id: field.name="duty.table.field" and file.name="AlertDef" and term="Field in work schedule table" and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.recordid: duty.table.field - AlertDef - Field in work schedule table - - en
record.field.name: duty.table.field
record.file.name: AlertDef

brief.brief: The field in the Table indicated by the Table name field (duty.table) that contains the Work schedule.
To perform a search based on this field, indicate the field name used in the alerts you want to find.

detail.detail: Service Manager uses the table and field you specify in alert calculations.
